title: MP4 boot: next mainloop stub candidates
description: Decide next low-risk MP4 mainloop stub to replace with a minimal decomp slice. Candidates: WipeExecAlways (wipe.c, heavy GX+MTX), pfDrawFonts (printfunc.c, heavy GX+MTX), MGSeqMain (minigame_seq.c?), Hu3DExec (3D engine, heavy), HuPrcCall (process.c, requires HuMem + jmp). For each, record required SDK functions not yet modeled and pick the next feasible one.
close_reason: Decision: next low-risk progress is adding missing SDK math (MTXOrtho/MTXIdentity) so we can run more MP4 decomp (e.g. WipeExecAlways). Heavy stubs (HuPrcCall/MGSeqMain/pfDrawFonts/Hu3DExec) remain blocked for now.
